name: G-HomebyGabbaGoods
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
You can simply ask Alexa to control your GabbaGoods Smart Devices, including Smart Bulbs, Smart Wall Plugs, Smart LED Strip Lights, and more. 
Please see below steps to connect your Smart Device to Alexa.
1. Download our G-Home by GabbaGoods APP in the Apple Store or the Google Play Store.
2. Configure your devices in the Amazon Alexa APP, and you will have the options to rename your devices, examples “Kitchen Light”, “John’s Room”, “Main Bathroom” etc. 
3. Download the Amazon "Alexa" APP from android, iOS or Amazon app marketplaces then configure Echo with the "Alexa" APP.
4. Search “G-home By GabbaGoods" skill from the "Alexa" APP skills category.
5. Enable "G-Home by GabbaGoods" skill, and you'll be navigated to the G-Home by GabbaGoods login page.
6. Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking Alexa to your smart devices. 
7. Once the setup is complete, you can enjoy using voice commands for your smart devices. Below are some examples of the voice commands that you can use to operate your smart device. 
“Alexa, turn on the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, turn off the bedroom light.”
“Alexa, set the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, brighten the bedroom light to 50%.”
“Alexa, dim the bedroom light to 50%.”
"Alexa, set bedroom light to green."
"Alexa, set bedroom light to cool white."
